title: All Ball - USA vs. Spain Preview, Keys to Victory, USA FIBA Flaws with Poland Men's Nat'l Team HC Mike Taylor
itunes:title: All Ball - USA vs. Spain Preview, Keys to Victory, USA FIBA Flaws with Poland Men's Nat'l Team HC Mike Taylor
description:
In this episode, ahead of Team USA facing off against Spain in the Olympic quarterfinals, Doug sits down with Poland Men's National Team Head Coach Mike Taylor, who previews Team USA vs. Spain quarterfinal matchup, Team USA's biggest weaknesses, the biggest difference in the FIBA game compared to the NBA, and his prediction for the matchup. He also dives into how he prepared for a YEAR to face Luka Doncic, and breaks down the remaining teams left in the Olympic tournament. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
